Class: CharacterAttributes

CharacterAttributes

new CharacterAttributes()

Specifies the properties of a character contained in a text frame. A CharacterStyle object associates these attributes with a specific text range through its characterAttributes property. NOTE: Character attributes do not have default values, and are undefined until explicitly set.
Source:
  • CharacterAttributes.js, line 7

Members

(inner) akiLeft :number

The amount of inter-character spacing to be added to the left side of the character, in thousandths of an em (that amount will not compress or expand during full-justification).
Type:
  • number
Source:
